title: Key Benefits & Features
subtitle: Discover why Pirate Mobile eSIM is the perfect solution for seamless connectivity worldwide.

features.title: Global Coverage
features.description: Stay online in over 190 countries with one eSIM. Perfect for travelers, remote workers, and digital nomads.

features.title: Instant Setup
features.description: Get connected in minutes. No need for a physical SIM or complicated installation.

features.title: Affordable Data
features.description: Enjoy local rates with no hidden fees. Save on roaming charges while traveling abroad.

features.title: Secure Connection
features.description: Your data stays private and reliable wherever you go. Surf, work, and stream safely.

features.title: Easy Management
features.description: Purchase plans, activate eSIMs, and monitor usage directly from the app. Simple and convenient.
